generations.description: Initial pheromone visualization implementation - replaced artificial gradients with real pheromone trail data in video capture
key_changes: Created unified ColorConfig system for consistent simulation/video colors
Implemented real PheromoneGrid data visualization in video capture
Green trails = food pheromones, Blue trails = nest pheromones
Immediate recording start (0 seconds) for complete behavior capture
Implemented averageTimeSinceGoal metric for comprehensive ant performance tracking
Added real-time video overlay with generation info, metrics, and status
Enhanced ant visualization with directional indicators (white pixels)
Created automation wrapper scripts for streamlined simulation + video workflow
Established organized file structure with videos/ and debug/ directories
Implemented constraint system to prevent optimization shortcuts
technical_achievements: Real-time pixel-based text rendering in video frames
Unified color configuration system across simulation and video
Goal achievement tracking with precise timing
Automated file organization and video conversion pipeline
Git integration with comprehensive commit messages

next_planned_improvements: Fix text rendering to show readable characters instead of rectangles
Make directional indicators more visible (larger white squares)
Optimize pheromone trail following algorithms based on new metrics
Improve ant stuck detection and recovery mechanisms
Create automated performance regression testing framework
